verses.text: I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to my \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, that I \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* not with my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*: I will \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* with a \w bridle|strong="H4269"\w*, while the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* is before me.\f + \fr 39.1 \ft my mouth…: Heb. a bridle, or, muzzle for my mouth\f*

I was \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w* with \w silence|strong="H1747"\w*, I held my \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*, \add even\add* from \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and my \w sorrow|strong="H3511"\w* was \w stirred|strong="H5916"\w*.\f + \fr 39.2 \ft stirred: Heb. troubled\f*

My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* was \w hot|strong="H2552"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* me, while I was \w musing|strong="H1901"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w burned|strong="H1197"\w*: \add  \+w then|strong="H0227"\+w*\add* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* I with my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*,

\nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, make me to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* mine \w end|strong="H7093"\w*, and the \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* of my \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, what it \add is; that\add* I may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how \w frail|strong="H2310"\w* I \add am\add*.\f + \fr 39.4 \ft how…: or, what time I have here\f*

Behold, thou hast \w made|strong="H5414"\w* my \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add as\add* an \w handbreadth|strong="H2947"\w*; and mine \w age|strong="H2465"\w* \add is\add* as nothing before thee: verily \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* at his best \w state|strong="H5324"\w* \add is\add* \w altogether|strong="H3605"\w* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 39.5 \ft at…: Heb. settled\f*

Surely every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in a vain \w shew|strong="H6754"\w*: surely they are \w disquieted|strong="H1993"\w* in \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*: he heapeth \w up|strong="H6651"\w* \add riches\add*, and \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* not who shall \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* them.\f + \fr 39.6 \ft a vain…: Heb. an image\f*
And now, \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, what \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* I for? my \w hope|strong="H8431"\w* \add is\add* in thee.
\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from all my \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*: \w make|strong="H7760"\w* me not the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of the \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w*.
I was \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w*, I \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* not my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; because thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

\w Remove|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w stroke|strong="H5061"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from me: I am \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* by the \w blow|strong="H8409"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 39.10 \ft blow: Heb. conflict\f*

When thou with \w rebukes|strong="H8433"\w* dost \w correct|strong="H3256"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, thou makest his \w beauty|strong="H2530"\w* to consume \w away|strong="H4529"\w* like a \w moth|strong="H6211"\w*: surely every \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add is\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 39.11 \ft his…: Heb. that which is to be desired in him to melt away\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto my \w cry|strong="H7775"\w*; hold not thy \w peace|strong="H2790"\w* at my \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*: for I \add am\add* a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* with thee, \add and\add* a \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w*, as all my \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \add were\add*.
O \w spare|strong="H8159"\w* me, that I may recover \w strength|strong="H1082"\w*, before I go \w hence|strong="H3212"\w*, and be no more.
